typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		orderid as integer,
		orderdate as string,
		customer as integer,
		product as integer,
		units as integer,
		billingaddress as string,
		remarks as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrdersDataSource
source(output(
		customerid as integer,
		fullname as string,
		address as string,
		credit as integer,
		status as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CustomersDataSource
source(output(
		itemdiscount as short,
		productid as short,
		title as string,
		unitprice as short,
		unitsinstock as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> ProductsDataSource
source(output(
		CityId as integer,
		CityName as string,
		Region as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CapitalCitiesdataSource
OrdersDataSource, CustomersDataSource join(customer == customerid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'right')~> OrdersCustomersJoin
OrdersCustomersJoin, ProductsDataSource join(product == productid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'right')~> OrdersCustomersProductsJoin
OrdersCustomersProductsJoin, CapitalCitiesdataSource join(address == CityName,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'right')~> OrderJoinedoutput
OrderJoinedoutput select(mapColumn(
		orderid,
		orderdate,
		units,
		billingaddress,
		fullname,
		customerlocation = address,
		credit,
		status,
		itemdiscount,
		title,
		unitprice,
		unitsinstock,
		Region
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedCoulumns
SelectedCoulumns derive(discount = toInteger(units * unitprice * itemdiscount * 0.01),
		amount = units * unitprice,
		activeStatus = iif(status, "Active", "Inactive"),
		customerType = iif(credit < 1000, "Silver", iif(credit >= 10000 && credit < 1000, "Gold", "Platinum"))
) ~> PrepareColumns
